entity_data.name: Lyra Flameheart
notable_features: Eyes that change color with seasons (currently amber for summer)
Elven half-plate armor designed with nature motifs

entity_data.name: Waterdeep
entity_data.government: Ruled by a council of masked Lords and the Open Lord
entity_data.defenses: Powerful city guard, magical wards, and walking statues
notable_features: Undermountain (vast dungeon complex beneath the city)

entity_data.name: Field Ward
entity_data.description: Shantytown outside the city walls of Waterdeep
notable_features: Diverse population of newcomers and outcasts

links.description: Elysia and Lyra are girlfriends, fellow sages, and adventuring companions
Field Ward is located outside Waterdeep's walls
